modules.purpose: AST consistency checker - verifies alignment between raw spec and AST
AST shape validator - validates AST structure and required fields
Task ancestry model - tracks transformation chain for each item
Dependency graph extraction and cycle detection for checklist tasks
Global ID registry for checklist items
Resolution chain builder for derived tasks
Codegen mapping inspector - determines codegen targets for checklist items
Maps JSON Pointer prefixes to expected file paths
Spec evolution tracker - compares old and new spec versions
Spec lifecycle model - tracks spec transformation states
